==Useful Info==
'''Marrowcudas''' are flying [[undead]] fish that can summon copies of itself when biting enemies. Each marrowcuda can have up to 8 clones. If the original marrowcuda is destroyed, all of its clones will immediately disappear. They appear in the early [[Dungeon]] and [[ossuary|ossuaries]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*Marrowcudas' attacks can only create clones if they do damage. Therefore, heavily armoured characters are less likely to get swarmed by clones.
*Try to target the original marrowcuda if possible. Piercing or AOE attacks shine.

==History==
*Marrowcudas were added in [[0.32]] with a new '''AF_SWARM''' attack flavour.
